videos.headline: 78-yard TD run extends Illinois' lead
videos.description: Illinois RB Ke'Shawn Vaughn takes off on a 78-yard touchdown run during the third quarter to put the Fighting Illini up 34 points over Purdue.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (78-yard TD run extends Illinois' lead) 2015/11/07 ESHEET
